name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.ssl.file.buffer.size
description: Buffer size for reading spills from file when using SSL.

name: dfs.balancer.max-size-to-move
description:
Maximum number of bytes that can be moved by the balancer in a single
    thread.

name: dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns
description:
The Secondary NameNode or CheckpointNode will create a checkpoint
  of the namespace every 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.txns' transactions, regardless
  of whether 'dfs.namenode.checkpoint.period' has expired.

name: mapreduce.input.lineinputformat.linespermap
description:
When using NLineInputFormat, the number of lines of input data
  to include in each split.

name: dfs.http.client.failover.sleep.base.millis
description:
Specify the base amount of time in milliseconds upon which the
    exponentially increased sleep time between retries or failovers
    is calculated for WebHDFS client.
